data.title: 'Little Prince' Adaptations Aren't Easy — Just Ask Orson Welles
data.meta_description: In 1943, the legendary filmmaker tried (and failed) to turn Antoine de Saint-Exupéry's book into a movie. Director Mark Osborne got considerably further. His adaptation hit theaters on Friday.
data.text:
